title: Sumio Endo
text:
is a Japanese <a href="judo">judo</a>ka, Olympic medalist and world champion.
He is from <a href="K%C5%8Driyama%2C%20Fukushima">Kōriyama, Fukushima</a>. After graduation from <a href="Nihon%20University">Nihon University</a>, He belonged to <a href="Tokyo%20Metropolitan%20Police%20Department">Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department</a>.
He received a bronze medal in the heavyweight class at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Montreal">Montreal</a>. He is <a href="1975%20World%20Judo%20Championships">world champion from 1975</a> and <a href="1979%20World%20Judo%20Championships">from 1979</a>.
As of 2008, He coaches judo at <a href="North%20Asia%20University">North Asia University</a> in <a href="Akita%2C%20Akita">Akita</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. He is also one of the 'Frontier Ambassadors' of his hometown Koriyama City.
